Balaams asse cudgeld: or The cry of town and countrey against scandalous and seditious scriblers. Chamberlain, Robert, b. 1607.
1 sheet ([1] p.).
Printed for the authour., London, : 1661.
Signed: Rob. Chamberlain. Verse: "What ailes the asse? How comes the Beast to whine? ..." Cf. Wing C1814 which has title word "ass". Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======
